Name: Pattern Recognition - PE
Text: First, I'll start by looking at each event and noting the patient's age, gender, department, and the sequence of activities. Since each case should represent a single patient's journey, events with the same age and gender are likely part of the same case, but I'll have to check if the departments and activities make sense together.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Case 1: M45, ER Event 1: Registration Then event 4: triage Then event 7: X-ray (which could follow triage for a fracture) Then event 12: Doctor consult (diagnosis of hairline fracture) Then event 15: Discharge with follow-up. That makes sense.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Case 2: F62, ER Event 2: Registration Event 5: triage code 2 (more urgent) Event 8: Lab requested Event 10: Lab completed Event 11: Doctor consult (diagnosis minor infection) Event 14: Prescription (antibiotics) Event 17: Discharge. This flow works.

Name: Deductive Reasoning - PE
Text: Case 3: M28, Surgery Event 3: Registration in Surgery dept Event 6: Doctor consult (scheduled knee surgery) Event 9: Surgery prep (anesthesia) Event 13: Surgery performed (arthroscopy) Event 16: Recovery room Event 18: Discharge with physio follow-up. This sequence fits.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Check the timestamps for each case to ensure logical order without overlaps causing confusion. For example: Case1 (M45): 1 (08:05), 4 (08:10), 7 (08:15), 12 (08:23), 15 (08:30). Timestamps are sequential and spaced reasonably. Case2 (F62): 2 (08:07), 5 (08:12), 8 (08:16), 10 (08:20), 11 (08:22), 14 (08:27), 17 (08:35). Also sequential. Case3 (M28): 3 (08:07:15), 6 (08:13) after registration. Then event 9 (08:16:45), 13 (08:25:19), 16 (08:31:37), 18 (08:40:13). All in order.

Name: Validation - PE
Text: No conflicting departments. For instance, the M28 is in Surgery throughout, while the others are ER. The activities align with their departments. For example, M28's surgery steps are all in Surgery or related departments like Radiology (but M45 went to Radiology).

Name: Validation - PE
Text: Additional info checks: - M45 has X-ray for left leg and diagnosed with fracture. - F62 had blood test, diagnosed with infection, given antibiotics. - M28 had knee surgery, recovery, etc.
